S

SaleProductRowDataGateway - Class in dataaccess
An in-memory representation of a row gateway for the products composing a sale.
SaleProductRowDataGateway(int, int, double) - Constructor for class dataaccess.SaleProductRowDataGateway
Creates an association between a saleId and a productId.
SaleRowDataGateway - Class in dataaccess
An in-memory representation of a row gateway for a sale row.
SaleRowDataGateway(int, Date) - Constructor for class dataaccess.SaleRowDataGateway
Creates a new sale given the client Id and the date it occurs.
setDescription(String) - Method in class dataaccess.ProductRowDataGateway
Updates the product's description.
setDesignation(String) - Method in class dataaccess.CustomerRowDataGateway
Updates the customer designation.
setDiscount(double) - Method in class dataaccess.SaleRowDataGateway
Updates the sales total discount
setDiscountType(DiscountType) - Method in class dataaccess.CustomerRowDataGateway
Updates the discount id of the customer
setEligibleForDiscount(boolean) - Method in class dataaccess.ProductRowDataGateway
Updates the eligibility condition of a product.
setFaceValue(double) - Method in class dataaccess.ProductRowDataGateway
Updates the product's face value
setPhoneNumber(int) - Method in class dataaccess.CustomerRowDataGateway
Updates the phone number
setQty(double) - Method in class dataaccess.ProductRowDataGateway
Updates the product's stock quantity
setStatus(SaleStatus) - Method in class dataaccess.SaleRowDataGateway
Updates the sale's status Notice that the setter and the getter convert the string to an enumerated value (of type SaleStatus) that is then used in the application's domain logic.
setTotal(double) - Method in class dataaccess.SaleRowDataGateway
Updates the sales total
setUnitId(int) - Method in class dataaccess.ProductRowDataGateway
Updates the units id of the product.
